Rubbish service. Not one delivery is made before 2hours. Have to contact support everytime for faster delivery. Foods are usually cold to the touch due to late deliveries. Not to forget 5% additional charge over the delivery charge as well. Complete and utter disappointment. And lastly, for a midnight food delivery service their delivery man never ever has change. Always have to pay an extra 20-60tk because there is no way to get change at that hour.

Customer service is terrible. I once called their hotline to inquire about a delivery that was running late and they proceeded to lie to me by saying that the delivery person is waiting outside the restaurant to collect my food. They didn't stop to think that I would definitely call the restaurant, who confirmed that there was no delivery person waiting outside their restaurant. After that, the hotline went totally cold as they stopped answering my calls. They didn't even resolve my complaint.

I tried to order several times from this app but failed. Everytime it says that the restaurant I chose does not deliver to my area. However, every restaurant I have picked says that they deliver all over Dhaka using Munchies. I even called the restaurants directly and asked them. They said I should call the Munchies Helpline and order directly there if the app isn't working. But no one picks up the call at the helpline. What's the point of a delivery app if I can't even order?!

I see discounts like 'any pizza on Fat Boy Pies for 600 taka' but I cannot see any option to choose that in their app. And whenever there is a discount the original price gets slashed and sicounted price is shown but whenever I add that specific item, the original price gets added not the discounted price.
